submenuItems.name: Hamburger
submenuItems.desc: Fresh quarter pound of ground beef grilled to perfection on a sesame seed bun with crisp green shredded lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles and your choice of dressing.

submenuItems.name: Cheeseburger
submenuItems.desc: Fresh quarter pound of ground beef grilled to perfection, topped with American cheese on a sesame seed bun with crisp green shredded lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles and your choice of dressing.

submenuItems.name: Onion Burger
submenuItems.desc: Sizzling burger piled high with grilled onions served on a sesame seed bun with mustard and pickles.

submenuItems.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
submenuItems.desc: Burger finished with American cheese and crisp bacon on a sesame seed bun with mayonnaise, lettuce, and tomato.

submenuItems.name: Hickory Burger
submenuItems.desc: A variation on the classic BBQ burger. Tender juicy burger served on a sesame seed bun with hickory sauce and diced onions.

submenuItems.name: Patty Melt on Rye
submenuItems.desc: A perfectly grilled burger sandwiched between melted cheese and a generous layer of grilled onions on rye bread.

submenuItems.name: Jumbo Cheeseburger
submenuItems.desc: Itâ€™s grill time and the Jumbo with cheese is a great selection for those with large appetites. Two moist and juicy burgers double layered with cheese on a bed of lettuce, onions, tomato, pickles and your choice of dressing all on a sesame seed bun.

submenuItems.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
submenuItems.desc: Imagine a sizzling quarter pound burger topped with mouth watering mushrooms, melted swiss cheese, mayonnaise, lettuce and pickles.

submenuItems.name: Chicken Breast
submenuItems.desc: A juicy succulent breast of italian grilled chicken on a sesame seed bun topped with mayonnaise, lettuce, and tomato.

submenuItems.name: Ham and Cheese
submenuItems.desc: A 3 oz. ham steak grilled to perfection on a sesame seed bun with fresh onions, pickles, and mustard.

submenuItems.name: Polish Sausage
submenuItems.desc: Moist sausage grilled to perfection on a sesame seed bun with fresh onions, pickles, and mustard.

submenuItems.name: Jalapeno Burger
submenuItems.desc: Fresh quarter pound of beef grilled to perfection on a sesame seed bun with mustard, grilled onion, grilled jalapeno, fresh tomato, pickles and lettuce.

submenuItems.name: Veggie Mushroom Swiss Sandwic
submenuItems.desc: Grilled mushrooms with Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on toast.

submenuItems.name: Chicken Club Sandwich
submenuItems.desc: Grilled chicken with melted Swiss cheese and crispy slices of bacon, on toast with mayonnaise, pickles, and lettuce.

submenuItems.name: Chicken Mushroom Swiss
submenuItems.desc: Grilled chicken topped with mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, mayonnaise, pickles and lettuce.

submenuItems.name: Mushroom Patty Melt
submenuItems.desc: A perfectly grilled burger sandwiched between melted cheese and a generous layer of grilled onions and mushrooms on rye bread.
